import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Settings, BarChart3, Shield, Users, Activity, LogIn, RefreshCw, Clock, AlertTriangle, CheckCircle, Server, Database, Key, Eye, EyeOff } from 'lucide-react'; const Dashboard = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [isAuthenticated, setIsAuthenticated] = useState(false); const [token, setToken] = useState(''); const [loginData, setLoginData] = useState({ username: '', password: '' }); const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); // Mock data - replace with actual API calls const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalRequests: 12847, rateLimitHits: 23, activeUsers: 156, uptime: '99.9%' }); const [recentActivity, setRecentActivity] = useState([ { id: 1, user: 'user_123', endpoint: '/api/users', status: 'success', time: '2 min ago' }, { id: 2, user: 'user_456', endpoint: '/api/data', status: 'rate_limited', time: '5 min ago' }, { id: 3, user: 'user_789', endpoint: '/api/users', status: 'success', time: '8 min ago' }, ]); const handleLogin = async () => { // Mock login - replace with actual API call if (loginData.username === 'admin' && loginData.password === 'admin') { setIsAuthenticated(true); setToken('mock-jwt-token'); } else { alert('Invalid credentials'); } }; if (!isAuthenticated) { return (
